mapper.select: SELECT s.id as id, s.user_name as userName, s.user_name as realName, s.student_number as studentNumber, s.class_name as className, s.major as major, s.enrollment_year as enrollmentYear, s.gender as gender, s.email as email, s.phone as phone, s.address as address, s.birth_date as birthDate, s.nationality as nationality, s.political_status as politicalStatus, s.id_card_number as idCardNumber, s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt FROM students s INNER JOIN course_student cs ON s.user_name = cs.student_name WHERE cs.course_name = #{courseName} ORDER BY s.student_number

SELECT s.id as id, s.user_name as userName, s.user_name as realName, s.student_number as studentNumber, s.class_name as className, s.major as major, s.enrollment_year as enrollmentYear, s.gender as gender, s.email as email, s.phone as phone, s.address as address, s.birth_date as birthDate, s.nationality as nationality, s.political_status as politicalStatus, s.id_card_number as idCardNumber, s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt FROM students s ORDER BY s.student_number

SELECT s.id as id, s.user_name as userName, s.user_name as realName, s.student_number as studentNumber, s.class_name as className, s.major as major, s.enrollment_year as enrollmentYear, s.gender as gender, s.email as email, s.phone as phone, s.address as address, s.birth_date as birthDate, s.nationality as nationality, s.political_status as politicalStatus, s.id_card_number as idCardNumber, s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt FROM students s WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id as id, s.user_name as userName, s.user_name as realName, s.student_number as studentNumber, s.class_name as className, s.major as major, s.enrollment_year as enrollmentYear, s.gender as gender, s.email as email, s.phone as phone, s.address as address, s.birth_date as birthDate, s.nationality as nationality, s.political_status as politicalStatus, s.id_card_number as idCardNumber, s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt FROM students s WHERE s.user_name = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (user_name, student_number, class_name, major, enrollment_year, gender, email, phone, address, birth_date, nationality, political_status, id_card_number) VALUES (#{userName}, #{studentNumber}, #{className}, #{major}, #{enrollmentYear}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{nationality}, #{politicalStatus}, #{idCardNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET user_name = #{userName}, student_number = #{studentNumber}, class_name = #{className}, major = #{major}, enrollment_year = #{enrollmentYear}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, nationality = #{nationality}, political_status = #{politicalStatus}, id_card_number = #{idCardNumber}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
